English:
--------
Category: Design & Editing 
Language: Multilingual including Spanish 
Operating system: Windows XP, Vista, 7 
Included: KeY 

Description: 
------------- 
Ashampoo 3D CAD Architecture 3 combines easy operation with leading professional CAD functions. Soon it will create exact models, 3D views, field plans and lists all of the construction and equipping projects.Plan renewal, your dream home, garden or even a complex building with all the necessary views 2D and 3D. Start immediately with the new start and project assistants. The startup wizard offers several opportunities to start your project. You can watch training videos or edit and expand an existing sample project. With the assistant project that quickly and easily create your first basic plan in a step by step process. In addition, you will be able to adjust the basic settings for your project. 

Like its predecessors, Ashampoo 3D CAD Architecture provides a comfortable grip 3 and an expanded role for the planning process with the participants again for an easy start. 

Ashampoo 3D CAD Architecture 3 provides even more options for building in 3D. For example, you can plan a rooftop terrace with solids removal or design your own flower pot and add 3D to the catalogs of objects. 

With its many CAD features and editing options Ashampoo 3D CAD Architecture 3 is a real alternative to expensive CAD software from other manufacturers. This software also will convince you with its ease of use and wide range of functions. 

Features: 

-NEW software features: Launching the project and assistant 
- NEW: the construction of 3D objects for free 
- NEW: The use of the removal of solids 
- Amounts integrated into the plug- 
- Area editor individually designed surfaces 
- Extensive 2D functions 
- Construction and entry aid 
- 2D and 3D Views (also in parallel) 
- Large catalog of objects, materials, textures and symbols 
- Adding your own objects to the catalog of objects 
- Export of views, actions lists, objects and buildings 
- Creation of land use plans, a picture or a sketch of a
